title: Banned & "Your Shop"
body:
I get unbanned tonight and since "Your shop" came out will i still receive the shop or will it not be obtainable for me.  I was planning on buying at least 1 skin with the RP i just purchased.  
Pls help

replies.body: Of course you'll still have access to your personal "Your Shop"! If you're not seeing it at all, hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so that we can take a look at what's going on.
Thanks very much.  I was getting a little worried lol.
